prompts.title: Business Plan Generator
prompts.description: Generate a comprehensive business plan with market analysis, financial projections, and strategic roadmap.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a seasoned business consultant. Create a comprehensive business plan for [BUSINESS NAME], a [BUSINESS TYPE] in the [INDUSTRY] industry. Include: 1) Executive Summary with mission statement and key highlights, 2) Company Description with legal structure and goals, 3) Market Analysis with target market, competitor analysis, and SWOT, 4) Products/Services with pricing strategy, 5) Marketing Plan with channels and customer acquisition, 6) Operations Plan with location and processes, 7) Management Team structure, 8) Financial Projections for 3 years including startup costs, revenue forecast, and break-even analysis. Format professionally with clear sections.
prompts.use_case: Entrepreneurs creating business plans for investors or strategic planning
prompts.example_output: Executive Summary: TechFlow Solutions is a B2B SaaS company revolutionizing inventory management...

prompts.title: Email Sequence Writer
prompts.description: Create a complete email sequence for sales, onboarding, or nurture campaigns.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as an expert email copywriter. Create a [NUMBER]-email sequence for [PURPOSE] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Company: [COMPANY NAME]. Goal: [PRIMARY GOAL]. Tone: [TONE]. For each email provide: 1) Subject line with 2 A/B variants, 2) Preview text, 3) Full email body with personalization tokens [FIRST_NAME], 4) Clear CTA, 5) Optimal send timing. Structure: Email 1 - Introduction/Value, Email 2 - Address pain point, Email 3 - Social proof, Email 4 - Urgency element, Email 5 - Final value/soft close. Ensure mobile-optimized formatting with short paragraphs.
prompts.use_case: Sales teams and marketers creating automated email campaigns
prompts.example_output:
Email 1 - The Warm Introduction
Subject: [FIRST_NAME], quick question about [COMPANY]'s growth...

prompts.title: Customer Service Response Templates
prompts.description: Generate professional customer service responses for common scenarios.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a customer service excellence trainer. Create response templates for [COMPANY NAME], a [BUSINESS TYPE]. Brand voice: [VOICE]. Generate templates for: 1) Product inquiries, 2) Order status, 3) Delayed shipment, 4) Wrong item received, 5) Refund request approval, 6) Refund denial, 7) General complaint, 8) Technical support. Each template should include: greeting, acknowledgment, empathy statement (for complaints), solution/next steps, and professional closing. Use placeholders: [CUSTOMER_NAME], [ORDER_NUMBER], [ISSUE], [RESOLUTION], [TIMEFRAME].
prompts.use_case: Customer service teams needing consistent response templates
prompts.example_output:
Template: Delayed Shipment
Dear [CUSTOMER_NAME], Thank you for reaching out about your order...

prompts.title: Product Description Optimizer
prompts.description: Transform basic product info into compelling, SEO-optimized descriptions.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as an e-commerce conversion specialist. Transform this product into a high-converting listing. Product: [PRODUCT NAME]. Category: [CATEGORY]. Price point: [PRICE RANGE]. Target customer: [DEMOGRAPHIC]. Features: [FEATURES]. Materials: [MATERIALS]. USPs: [UNIQUE POINTS]. Generate: 1) SEO title (60-70 chars), 2) Meta description (155 chars), 3) Main description (300-500 words) with benefit-focused copy, 4) 5-7 bullet points leading with benefits, 5) Primary and secondary keywords, 6) Image alt text suggestions. Use power words, address objections, include social proof placeholders.
prompts.example_output: SEO Title: Premium Bamboo Cutting Board Set | Eco-Friendly Kitchen Essential...

prompts.title: Legal Document Simplifier
prompts.description: Transform complex legal documents into plain-language summaries.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a legal communications specialist. Simplify this legal document for [READER ROLE]. Document type: [TYPE]. Jurisdiction: [LOCATION]. Provide: 1) Executive summary (what this document does), 2) Key terms explained in plain language with original clause references, 3) Your obligations list, 4) Their obligations list, 5) Red flags and concerns with risk levels, 6) Important dates and deadlines, 7) Exit/termination provisions, 8) Questions to ask before signing, 9) Glossary of legal terms. Include disclaimer that this is not legal advice. Document text: [PASTE DOCUMENT]
prompts.example_output: Executive Summary: This SaaS Agreement establishes a 12-month subscription...

prompts.title: Meeting Minutes Generator
prompts.description: Transform meeting notes into professional minutes with action items.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as an executive assistant. Transform these meeting notes into professional minutes. Meeting: [TITLE]. Date: [DATE]. Attendees: [NAMES]. Raw notes: [PASTE NOTES]. Generate: 1) Header with meeting details, 2) Executive summary (3-5 sentences), 3) Agenda items with discussion summaries, 4) Action items table (Item | Owner | Due Date | Priority | Status), 5) Decisions log with rationale, 6) Parking lot items for future, 7) Next meeting details. Use clear formatting, bullet points, and active voice. Keep objective and concise.
prompts.example_output:
MEETING MINUTES
Q4 Marketing Review | October 15, 2024...

prompts.title: Competitor Analysis Report
prompts.description: Generate a comprehensive competitor analysis with strategic insights.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a strategic business analyst. Create a competitor analysis for [YOUR COMPANY] in [INDUSTRY]. Your offerings: [PRODUCTS/SERVICES]. Competitors: [LIST 3-5 COMPETITORS]. Provide: 1) Competitor profiles (overview, market share, offerings, positioning), 2) Feature comparison matrix, 3) SWOT for each competitor, 4) Positioning map concept (2x2 axes), 5) Marketing and messaging analysis, 6) Pricing comparison, 7) Customer sentiment summary, 8) Threat assessment ranking, 9) Strategic recommendations to exploit weaknesses, 10) Executive summary with top 5 insights. Include specific, actionable recommendations.
prompts.example_output:
Competitor Profile: Acme Solutions
Market Position: Leader with 35% share...

prompts.title: Sales Call Script
prompts.description: Create persuasive sales scripts with objection handling.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a sales training expert. Create a sales call script for [PRODUCT/SERVICE] targeting [TARGET CUSTOMER]. Price: [PRICE]. Benefits: [TOP 3-5 BENEFITS]. Call type: [COLD/WARM/DEMO]. Generate: 1) Pre-call preparation checklist, 2) Opening hooks (3 variations), 3) Discovery questions (budget, authority, need, timeline), 4) Value presentation framework, 5) Objection handling for: budget, timing, competition, need to think, send info, current solution, 6) Trial closes, 7) Closing techniques (assumptive, alternative, summary), 8) Follow-up actions. Include natural, conversational language.
prompts.use_case: Sales teams developing effective call frameworks
prompts.example_output: Opening (Pattern Interrupt): Hi [NAME], this is [YOUR NAME] with [COMPANY]...

prompts.title: Social Media Content Calendar
prompts.description: Create a month-long content calendar with posts, captions, and hashtags.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a social media strategist. Create a 30-day content calendar for [BRAND] in [INDUSTRY]. Platforms: [PLATFORMS]. Audience: [DEMOGRAPHICS]. Goals: [GOALS]. Voice: [TONE]. For each day provide: 1) Platform, 2) Content type (image, carousel, video, story), 3) Topic/concept, 4) Full caption, 5) Hashtags (15-30 for IG, 3-5 for LinkedIn), 6) Optimal posting time, 7) CTA. Include content mix: 30% educational, 20% entertaining, 20% promotional, 15% engagement, 10% behind-scenes, 5% UGC. Add 4 carousel concepts, 4 reel ideas, and 2 contest frameworks.
prompts.use_case: Social media managers planning monthly content
prompts.example_output:
DAY 1 - Monday
Platform: Instagram + LinkedIn
Type: Educational Carousel...

prompts.title: Job Description Writer
prompts.description: Create compelling, inclusive job descriptions that attract talent.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a talent acquisition specialist. Create a job description for [JOB TITLE] at [COMPANY] in [INDUSTRY]. Department: [DEPT]. Reports to: [MANAGER]. Location: [LOCATION/REMOTE]. Must-haves: [REQUIREMENTS]. Nice-to-haves: [PREFERRED]. Generate: 1) Attention-grabbing headline, 2) Company overview (100-150 words), 3) Role overview with impact, 4) 8-12 responsibilities (action verbs, outcomes), 5) Requirements (skills-based, not credential-based), 6) Benefits and perks, 7) Inclusive language throughout, 8) Equal opportunity statement, 9) Application process, 10) 3-5 screening questions. Avoid jargon, gendered terms, and inflated requirements.
prompts.use_case: HR professionals creating effective job postings
prompts.example_output: Join Our Team as Senior Product Designer - Shape the Future of Healthcare Tech...

prompts.title: Crisis Communication Plan
prompts.description: Develop crisis communication plans with response templates.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a crisis communications expert. Create a crisis plan for [COMPANY] in [INDUSTRY]. Stakeholders: [LIST]. Potential scenarios: [3-5 SCENARIOS]. Generate: 1) Crisis classification system (Levels 1-4 with triggers), 2) Response team structure and roles, 3) Initial 60-minute protocol, 4) Stakeholder communication matrix (concerns, channels, timing), 5) Message templates (holding statement, press release, internal memo, social media, customer notification), 6) Scenario-specific playbooks with Q&A, 7) Media management guidelines, 8) Social media response decision tree, 9) Recovery phase tactics, 10) Training and drill schedule. Include practical, immediately usable content.
prompts.use_case: Communications teams preparing for potential crises
prompts.example_output:
CRISIS LEVEL 3: Data Breach Playbook
First 15 Minutes: Confirm scope, notify legal...

prompts.title: Performance Review Generator
prompts.description: Create balanced performance reviews with feedback and development plans.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as an HR professional. Generate a performance review for [EMPLOYEE NAME], [ROLE], review period [DATES]. Accomplishments: [LIST]. Goals achieved: [WHICH]. Challenges: [ISSUES]. Observations: Technical [OBS], Soft skills [OBS], Collaboration [OBS]. Generate: 1) Executive summary with rating recommendation, 2) Ratings by competency (1-5) with specific examples, 3) Key accomplishments recognition, 4) 2-3 development areas (growth-oriented language), 5) 3-5 SMART goals for next period, 6) Development plan with training recommendations, 7) Career discussion points, 8) Follow-up schedule. Balance positive and constructive feedback, use objective language.
prompts.example_output:
PERFORMANCE REVIEW: Sarah Chen - Senior Analyst
Rating: Exceeds Expectations (4.2/5)...

prompts.title: Website Copy Rewriter
prompts.description: Rewrite website copy for better conversions and clarity.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a conversion copywriter. Rewrite website copy for [COMPANY] selling [OFFERING] to [AUDIENCE]. Primary goal: [ACTION]. Current pain points: [ISSUES]. Generate optimized copy for: HOMEPAGE - 1) Hero (headline, subhead, CTA), 2) Value prop section with 3-4 benefits, 3) How it works (3-4 steps), 4) Social proof section, 5) Final CTA. ABOUT PAGE - Mission, story, team, values. SERVICES PAGE - Overview, individual service blocks, comparison. Include: Meta titles/descriptions, heading hierarchy, microcopy (buttons, forms), SEO keywords. Use 'you' language, short paragraphs, specific numbers.
prompts.example_output:
HERO SECTION
Headline: Get Paid Faster Without Chasing Invoices...

prompts.title: Pitch Deck Script
prompts.description: Create compelling investor pitch scripts with speaker notes.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a pitch coach. Create a pitch deck script for [COMPANY] seeking [AMOUNT] in [ROUND]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Problem: [PROBLEM]. Solution: [SOLUTION]. Traction: [METRICS]. Team: [KEY MEMBERS]. Generate 12 slides: 1) Title, 2) Problem (45s), 3) Solution (45s), 4) Demo/Product (60s), 5) Market opportunity TAM/SAM/SOM (45s), 6) Business model (45s), 7) Traction (45s), 8) Competition (30s), 9) Go-to-market (30s), 10) Team (30s), 11) Financials/Ask (45s), 12) Close (15s). For each: slide title, visual concept, word-for-word script, timing, key emphasis points, potential investor questions. Include Q&A prep with 15 tough questions and answers.
prompts.example_output:
SLIDE 2: THE PROBLEM (45 seconds)
Visual: Frustrated business owner
Script: 'Last year, US businesses wrote off $125 billion...'

prompts.title: Customer Onboarding Sequence
prompts.description: Design complete customer onboarding with emails and in-app messages.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a customer success architect. Design onboarding for [PRODUCT] targeting [USER TYPE]. Time to value: [TIMEFRAME]. Key activation actions: [ACTIONS]. Generate: 1) Welcome email sequence (6 emails over 14 days with subject, body, CTA, timing), 2) First-run product tour (5 steps with tooltip copy), 3) Progress milestone celebrations (4-5 milestones), 4) In-app nudges for inactivity, 5) Re-engagement sequence for stalled users, 6) Onboarding completion celebration, 7) Transition to regular customer messaging, 8) Metrics to track. Include all copy with personalization tokens [FIRST_NAME], [COMPANY], [GOAL].
prompts.example_output:
EMAIL 1: Welcome (Immediate)
Subject: Welcome to [PRODUCT], [FIRST_NAME]!...

prompts.title: Newsletter Content Creator
prompts.description: Create engaging newsletter content with multiple sections.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a newsletter editor. Create a complete issue for [NEWSLETTER NAME] targeting [AUDIENCE] in [INDUSTRY]. Main topic: [TOPIC]. Voice: [TONE]. Generate: 1) 5 subject line options (curiosity, benefit, news, question, list), 2) Personal intro (100-150 words), 3) Main feature article (400-600 words), 4) Quick hits section (3-5 items with summaries), 5) How-to/deep dive (300-400 words), 6) Curated resources (tool, article, podcast), 7) Community spotlight, 8) What's coming teaser, 9) Engaging closing with CTA. Include social media teaser and estimated read time.
prompts.example_output: Subject: The one metric we've been measuring wrong (and what to do instead)...

prompts.title: Video Script Writer
prompts.description: Create engaging video scripts for YouTube or courses.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a video content creator. Write a script for [TOPIC], [DURATION] minutes, for [PLATFORM]. Audience: [VIEWER TYPE]. Style: [TUTORIAL/VLOG/EDUCATIONAL]. Goal: [VIEWER ACTION]. Generate: 1) Hook (first 5-15 seconds), 2) Intro with credibility and preview (15-30s), 3) Main content sections with talking points, B-roll suggestions, on-screen text, 4) Mid-video engagement prompt, 5) Value bomb/key insight moment, 6) CTA section, 7) Outro with summary. Format: [VISUAL CUE] HOST: 'Script' (direction) TEXT ON SCREEN: 'overlay'. Include YouTube optimization: 3 titles, description, tags, thumbnail concept, chapters.
prompts.example_output:
HOOK [0:00-0:08]
[VISUAL: Close-up, then montage]
HOST: 'I wasted 200 hours learning this wrong...'

prompts.title: Brand Voice Guidelines
prompts.description: Create comprehensive brand voice and tone guidelines.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a brand strategist. Create brand voice guidelines for [BRAND] in [INDUSTRY]. Target: [AUDIENCE]. Values: [VALUES]. Competitors: [COMPETITORS]. Generate: 1) Voice overview and definition, 2) 4-5 voice attributes with definitions, examples, and anti-examples, 3) Tone variations by context (marketing, support, social, legal, crisis), 4) Writing principles (10 do's, 10 don'ts), 5) Vocabulary guide (preferred terms, avoided words, signature phrases), 6) Grammar and style rules, 7) Channel-specific guidelines (website, email, social, support), 8) 10 before/after transformations, 9) Voice checklist for writers. Include training exercises.
prompts.example_output:
VOICE ATTRIBUTE 1: Confidently Helpful
Definition: We speak with earned authority...

prompts.title: FAQ Page Generator
prompts.description: Create comprehensive SEO-optimized FAQ pages.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a customer support and SEO specialist. Create FAQ page for [COMPANY/PRODUCT] in [INDUSTRY]. Common issues: [ISSUES]. Generate FAQs for: 1) General (5-7 Qs), 2) Getting started (5-7 Qs), 3) Pricing/billing (5-7 Qs), 4) Product-specific (8-10 Qs), 5) Account management (5-7 Qs), 6) Troubleshooting (5-7 Qs). For each: natural language question, SEO-optimized phrasing, answer (50-150 words) with steps where needed. Include schema markup structure, meta title/description, quick answers section for top 5, chatbot-formatted versions.
prompts.example_output:
Q: How do I create my [Product] account?
A: Creating your account takes less than 2 minutes...

prompts.title: Grant Proposal Writer
prompts.description: Create compelling grant proposals with needs statements and budgets.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a grant writing consultant. Write a proposal for [ORGANIZATION] seeking [AMOUNT] from [FUNDER]. Mission: [MISSION]. Project: [PROJECT NAME]. Problem: [ISSUE]. Solution: [APPROACH]. Generate: 1) Cover letter, 2) Executive summary, 3) Statement of need (2-3 pages with data), 4) Project description with SMART goals, methodology, timeline, 5) Evaluation plan with outcomes and indicators, 6) Organizational capacity, 7) Detailed budget with narrative justification, 8) Sustainability plan, 9) Appendices checklist. Use funder's language and priorities. Include human stories with data. Format professionally.
prompts.example_output:
EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Healthy Futures Initiative requests $75,000 from the Johnson Foundation...

prompts.title: Podcast Episode Planner
prompts.description: Plan complete podcast episodes with outlines, questions, and show notes.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a podcast producer. Plan episode [NUMBER] of [PODCAST NAME] about [TOPIC]. Format: [SOLO/INTERVIEW/PANEL]. Guest: [GUEST NAME AND BIO if applicable]. Duration: [LENGTH]. Generate: 1) Episode title options (5), 2) Episode description (SEO-optimized), 3) Cold open hook script, 4) Intro script with sponsor mention, 5) Segment breakdown with timing, 6) Interview questions (15-20) progressing from easy to deep, 7) Talking points for each segment, 8) Sponsor ad read scripts, 9) Outro with CTA, 10) Show notes template with timestamps, links, resources, 11) Social media promotional posts, 12) Audiogram clip suggestions (3 quotable moments).
prompts.example_output:
Episode Title Options:
1. 'From Burnout to Breakthrough: [Guest]'s Unconventional Path'...

prompts.title: Webinar Script Generator
prompts.description: Create complete webinar scripts with slides, engagement, and sales elements.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a webinar marketing expert. Create a script for [WEBINAR TITLE] targeting [AUDIENCE]. Duration: [LENGTH]. Goal: [LEAD GEN/SALES/EDUCATION]. Offer: [PRODUCT/SERVICE if applicable]. Generate: 1) Pre-webinar email sequence (3 emails), 2) Slide-by-slide script with visual descriptions, 3) Opening hook and housekeeping, 4) Content sections with engagement prompts (polls, Q&A), 5) Transition statements, 6) Pitch section (if applicable) with offer reveal, 7) Q&A facilitation notes, 8) Closing and next steps, 9) Follow-up email sequence (attendees and no-shows), 10) Slide deck outline. Include timing markers and audience interaction points throughout.

SLIDE 1 (0:00-0:30) - Title Slide
Visual: Title with speaker photo
Script: 'Welcome everyone, we're going to get started...'

prompts.title: SOP Document Creator
prompts.description: Create detailed Standard Operating Procedures for any process.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as an operations consultant. Create an SOP for [PROCESS NAME] at [COMPANY]. Department: [DEPARTMENT]. Process owner: [OWNER]. Current issues: [PAIN POINTS]. Generate: 1) Document header (title, version, effective date, approvals), 2) Purpose and scope, 3) Definitions and acronyms, 4) Roles and responsibilities matrix, 5) Prerequisites and required resources, 6) Step-by-step procedure with numbered instructions, decision points, and screenshots/diagrams descriptions, 7) Quality checkpoints, 8) Troubleshooting common issues, 9) Related documents and references, 10) Revision history, 11) Training requirements. Format for easy scanning with clear headings, bullet points, and decision trees.

STANDARD OPERATING PROCEDURE
SOP-2024-001: Customer Refund Processing
Version: 1.0...

prompts.title: Case Study Writer
prompts.description: Transform customer success stories into compelling case studies.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a content marketing specialist. Create a case study for [COMPANY]'s work with [CLIENT]. Industry: [CLIENT INDUSTRY]. Challenge: [PROBLEM]. Solution: [WHAT YOU DID]. Results: [OUTCOMES/METRICS]. Generate: 1) Attention-grabbing title with result, 2) Executive summary (100 words), 3) Client background and challenge (200 words), 4) Solution implementation (300 words with specific details), 5) Results with quantified metrics, 6) Client testimonial quote, 7) Key takeaways (3-5 bullets), 8) Call-to-action, 9) Sidebar elements (quick stats, timeline, services used). Include SEO title, meta description, and social promotional copy. Use storytelling structure: situation, problem, solution, result.
prompts.use_case: Marketing teams creating customer success content
prompts.example_output: How [Client] Increased Revenue 340% in 6 Months Using [Solution]...

prompts.title: Press Release Writer
prompts.description: Write professional press releases for company announcements.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a PR specialist. Write a press release for [COMPANY] announcing [NEWS/EVENT]. Location: [CITY]. Date: [DATE]. Key details: [IMPORTANT INFORMATION]. Spokesperson: [NAME, TITLE]. Generate: 1) Headline (attention-grabbing, under 10 words), 2) Subheadline (context), 3) Dateline, 4) Lead paragraph (who, what, when, where, why), 5) Supporting paragraphs with details, quotes, and context, 6) Boilerplate (company description), 7) Media contact information, 8) Multimedia notes (images, video available). Follow AP style. Include: 2 alternative headlines, social media announcement (Twitter, LinkedIn), and pitch email template for journalists. Keep to one page (400-500 words).

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

TechStart Secures $15M Series A to Revolutionize Small Business Lending...

prompts.title: Training Manual Creator
prompts.description: Create comprehensive training manuals for employee development.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a learning and development specialist. Create a training manual for [TOPIC/ROLE] at [COMPANY]. Target learners: [AUDIENCE]. Prior knowledge: [PREREQUISITES]. Generate: 1) Cover page and table of contents, 2) Introduction with learning objectives, 3) Module breakdown (5-7 modules), 4) For each module: overview, key concepts, step-by-step instructions, examples, practice exercises, knowledge check questions, 5) Visual aids descriptions (diagrams, flowcharts), 6) Quick reference guides, 7) Glossary, 8) Assessment/certification criteria, 9) Resources for further learning, 10) Trainer notes section. Use adult learning principles. Include real-world scenarios and hands-on activities.

MODULE 1: Introduction to Customer Success

prompts.title: RFP Response Generator
prompts.description: Create winning RFP responses with tailored solutions and pricing.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a proposal specialist. Create an RFP response for [YOUR COMPANY] responding to [CLIENT]'s RFP for [PROJECT TYPE]. Requirements: [KEY REQUIREMENTS]. prompts.title: Employee Handbook Sections

prompts.title: Chatbot Conversation Flows

prompts.title: Event Planning Checklist

prompts.title: User Research Interview Guide
prompts.description: Create comprehensive user research interview scripts and guides.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a UX researcher. Create an interview guide for [RESEARCH OBJECTIVE] targeting [USER TYPE]. Product: [PRODUCT/FEATURE]. Research questions: [KEY QUESTIONS TO ANSWER]. Use open-ended questions. Avoid leading questions. Include time estimates per section.

prompts.title: Product Launch Plan

Generate: 1) Launch objectives and success metrics, 2) Target audience and personas, 3) Positioning and messaging framework, 4) Competitive differentiation, 5) Pre-launch timeline (8-12 weeks), 6) Launch week activities, 7) Post-launch plan (30-60-90 days), 8) Channel strategy (owned, earned, paid), 9) Content calendar with assets needed, 10) Sales enablement materials list, 11) PR and media plan, 12) Budget allocation, 13) Team responsibilities RACI, 14) Risk mitigation. Include specific tactics for each channel.

prompts.title: Customer Survey Designer
prompts.description: Design effective customer surveys with proper question structure.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a market research expert. Design a survey for [COMPANY] to learn about [OBJECTIVE]. Target respondents: [AUDIENCE]. Generate: 1) Survey title and introduction (explaining purpose, time, privacy), 2) Screening questions, 3) Main questions (15-25) with: question text, question type (multiple choice, scale, open-ended), answer options, logic/skip patterns, 4) Demographics section, 5) Thank you message, 6) Question randomization notes, 7) Incentive mention if applicable. Follow best practices: no leading questions, balanced scales, one concept per question, logical flow. Include analysis approach for each question type.

prompts.title: Investor Update Email
prompts.description: Write professional monthly/quarterly investor update emails.

Challenges: [ISSUES]. Asks: [HELP NEEDED]. Generate: 1) Subject line, 2) TL;DR summary (3-5 bullets), 3) Key metrics table (previous vs current), 4) Highlights section with context, 5) Challenges section (honest, with mitigation plans), 6) Product updates, 7) Team updates, 8) Financial summary, 9) Upcoming milestones, 10) Specific asks (intros, advice, resources), 11) Closing note. Be transparent about challenges. Quantify everything possible. Keep to one readable email length.

prompts.title: Return Policy Generator

prompts.title: Welcome Email Series

prompts.title: Company Bio Writer
prompts.description: Write company bios for different contexts and lengths.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a brand copywriter. Write company bios for [COMPANY NAME]. Industry: [INDUSTRY]. Founded: [YEAR]. Mission: [MISSION]. Key achievements: [ACHIEVEMENTS]. Unique aspects: [DIFFERENTIATORS]. Generate bios in these lengths: 1) Micro (25 words - social profiles), 2) Short (50 words - author bios), 3) Medium (100 words - about page summary), 4) Long (250 words - press kit), 5) Extended (500 words - full about page). Also create: 1) Boilerplate for press releases, 2) Speaker/podcast intro, 3) Award submission version, 4) Partnership pitch version. Maintain consistent voice across all. Include SEO keywords naturally.
prompts.use_case: Marketing teams creating consistent company descriptions
prompts.example_output:
MICRO BIO (25 words):
[Company] helps [target audience] achieve [outcome] through [method]. Founded [year]...

prompts.title: Stakeholder Update Template
prompts.description: Create templates for regular stakeholder updates and reports.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a project communications specialist. Create a stakeholder update template for [PROJECT NAME] at [COMPANY]. Stakeholders: [STAKEHOLDER TYPES]. Update frequency: [WEEKLY/BIWEEKLY/MONTHLY]. Generate: 1) Email subject line format, 2) Executive summary section (3-5 bullets), 3) Progress by workstream/milestone, 4) Status indicators (on track, at risk, blocked), 5) Key accomplishments since last update, 6) Upcoming milestones, 7) Risks and issues (with mitigations), 8) Decisions needed from stakeholders, 9) Resource/budget update (if applicable), 10) Next steps, 11) Appendix for details. Create for different stakeholder levels (executive, working team). Keep scannable.
prompts.example_output:
Subject: [Project Name] Weekly Update - Week of [Date]

TL;DR:
- [Green] Phase 2 on track...

prompts.title: Thought Leadership Article
prompts.description: Write authoritative thought leadership articles that establish expertise.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a thought leadership content strategist. Write a thought leadership article for [AUTHOR NAME], [TITLE] at [COMPANY]. Topic: [TOPIC]. Audience: [TARGET READERS]. Unique perspective: [WHAT MAKES YOUR VIEW DIFFERENT]. Generate: 1) Headline options (5, provocative yet credible), 2) Hook opening (challenge conventional wisdom), 3) Problem framing (industry context), 4) Your unique thesis/argument, 5) Supporting evidence (data, examples, frameworks), 6) Counter-arguments addressed, 7) Actionable insights (3-5 takeaways), 8) Future implications, 9) Strong conclusion with CTA, 10) Author bio. Length: [WORD COUNT]. Include subheadings, pull quotes, and data visualization suggestions.
prompts.use_case: Executives and experts building industry authority

HEADLINE OPTIONS:
1. Why Everything You Know About [Topic] Is About to Change...

prompts.title: Client Report Template
prompts.description: Create professional client deliverable and report templates.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a management consultant. Create a client report template for [SERVICE TYPE - strategy, audit, research, etc.] delivered to [CLIENT TYPE]. Typical engagement: [SCOPE]. Generate: 1) Cover page design elements, 2) Executive summary template, 3) Background and objectives section, 4) Methodology explanation, 5) Key findings structure, 6) Data visualization guidelines, 7) Analysis framework, 8) Recommendations format (prioritized, actionable), 9) Implementation roadmap template, 10) Risk considerations, 11) Next steps, 12) Appendix structure. Include placeholder text, formatting guidelines, and professional design tips. Add quality checklist before delivery.

SECTION 4: KEY FINDINGS

Finding 1: [Headline - quantified impact]

prompts.title: Pricing Page Copy
prompts.description: Write compelling pricing page copy that converts visitors to customers.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a conversion copywriter. Write pricing page copy for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Pricing model: [MODEL - subscription, one-time, usage]. Tiers: [TIER NAMES AND PRICES]. Target customers per tier: [WHO EACH TIER IS FOR]. Generate: 1) Page headline and subhead, 2) Tier names (clear, benefit-focused), 3) Tier descriptions (who it's for), 4) Feature list per tier (benefits, not just features), 5) Recommended tier callout, 6) Annual vs monthly toggle copy, 7) Feature comparison table, 8) FAQ section (5-7 questions), 9) Money-back guarantee copy, 10) Enterprise/custom callout, 11) Social proof placement, 12) Final CTA. Address common objections. Include microcopy for buttons.

HEADLINE: Simple, Transparent Pricing
SUBHEAD: Start free, upgrade as you grow. No surprises...

prompts.title: Investor Q&A Prep
prompts.description: Prepare for tough investor questions during fundraising.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a startup fundraising coach. Prepare Q&A for [COMPANY] raising [ROUND] of [AMOUNT]. Business model: [MODEL]. Stage: [STAGE]. Current metrics: [KEY METRICS]. Generate comprehensive answers for: 1) Why now? Market timing, 2) Team background and why you'll win, 3) Competition and differentiation, 4) Unit economics breakdown, 5) Customer acquisition strategy and CAC, 6) Path to profitability, 7) Use of funds, 8) Valuation justification, 9) Biggest risks and mitigations, 10) What happens if you miss targets, 11) Exit strategy, 12) Why this investor? For each: concise answer (30 seconds), detailed answer (2 minutes), data to reference, follow-up questions to anticipate.
prompts.example_output:
Q: What are your unit economics?

30-SECOND ANSWER:
'Our LTV to CAC ratio is 4.2x...'

prompts.title: Workshop Design Template

prompts.prompt_text: Act as a negotiation coach. Develop a strategy for [NEGOTIATION TYPE - salary, contract, partnership, purchase, etc.]. Your position: [DESCRIBE]. Counterparty: [WHO]. Stakes: [WHAT'S AT STAKE]. Generate: 1) Situation analysis, 2) BATNA development, 3) ZOPA identification, 4) Your interests prioritized, 5) Their likely interests, 6) Opening position recommendation, 7) Concession strategy, 8) Value creation opportunities, 9) Anchor points to set, 10) Questions to ask, 11) Pressure tactics to expect, 12) Counter-tactic responses, 13) Body language tips, 14) Walk-away criteria, 15) Agreement documentation points.
prompts.example_output:
NEGOTIATION STRATEGY: [Type]

1. SITUATION ANALYSIS...

prompts.title: Music Recommendation Engine
prompts.description: Generate personalized music recommendations based on preferences.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a music curator. Recommend music based on: [PREFERENCES - artists, genres, moods, eras liked]. Purpose: [WORK, WORKOUT, RELAXATION, PARTY, etc.]. Discovery level: [FAMILIAR, SOME NEW, EXPLORE]. Generate: 1) Taste profile analysis, 2) Core genre recommendations, 3) Similar artists to explore, 4) Playlist concept 1 (with tracks), 5) Playlist concept 2 (with tracks), 6) Deep cuts and hidden gems, 7) New releases to check, 8) Classic essentials, 9) Cross-genre discoveries, 10) Mood-based suggestions, 11) Activity-matched music, 12) Emerging artists, 13) Live performance recommendations, 14) Podcast/documentary suggestions, 15) Listening roadmap.
prompts.example_output:
MUSIC RECOMMENDATIONS
Based on: [Preferences]

1. TASTE PROFILE...

prompts.title: Customer Support Script Generator
prompts.description: Create comprehensive customer support scripts and responses.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a customer experience manager. Create support scripts for [COMPANY/PRODUCT]. Channel: [PHONE, CHAT, EMAIL]. Scenarios: [LIST COMMON ISSUES]. Tone: [FORMAL, FRIENDLY, EMPATHETIC]. Generate: 1) Greeting scripts (variations), 2) Verification protocols, 3) Issue identification questions, 4) Script for scenario 1, 5) Script for scenario 2, 6) Script for scenario 3, 7) Escalation language, 8) Hold/transfer scripts, 9) De-escalation phrases, 10) Apology frameworks, 11) Solution presentation scripts, 12) Closing scripts, 13) Follow-up templates, 14) Survey invitation scripts, 15) Edge case handling.
prompts.example_output:
CUSTOMER SUPPORT SCRIPTS: [Product]

1. GREETING SCRIPTS...

prompts.title: Research Question Developer
prompts.description: Develop and refine research questions for academic or market research.
prompts.prompt_text: Act as a research methodologist. Develop research questions for [TOPIC/AREA]. Research type: [ACADEMIC, MARKET, UX, POLICY]. Discipline: [FIELD]. Generate: 1) Topic exploration and scope, 2) Central research question options, 3) Sub-questions derived, 4) Hypothesis formulations (if applicable), 5) Variable identification, 6) Conceptual framework sketch, 7) Operationalization suggestions, 8) Feasibility assessment, 9) Literature connection points, 10) Methodology implications, 11) Data requirements, 12) Potential limitations, 13) Significance statement, 14) Refinement recommendations, 15) Related questions for future research.
prompts.example_output:
RESEARCH QUESTION DEVELOPMENT: [Topic]

1. TOPIC EXPLORATION...

prompts.title: Photorealistic Portrait Generator
prompts.description: Generate stunning photorealistic portrait photographs with professional lighting and composition.
prompts.prompt_text: Create a photorealistic portrait photograph of [SUBJECT DESCRIPTION - age, gender, ethnicity, expression]. Setting: [ENVIRONMENT]. Lighting: [LIGHTING TYPE - natural window light, studio Rembrandt, golden hour, etc.]. Camera angle: [ANGLE]. Style reference: [PHOTOGRAPHER NAME or STYLE]. Include: 1) Sharp focus on eyes, 2) Natural skin texture, 3) Appropriate depth of field, 4) Professional color grading, 5) Catchlights in eyes. Technical specs: Shot on [CAMERA], [LENS]mm lens, f/[APERTURE], [MOOD] atmosphere. Avoid: artificial looking skin, uncanny valley effects, distorted features.
prompts.use_case: Photographers and marketers creating realistic portrait imagery
prompts.example_output: A photorealistic portrait of a 30-year-old woman with warm brown eyes, soft smile, natural makeup, shot in golden hour light...

prompts.title: Fantasy Character Designer

Equipment: [WEAPONS, ARMOR, ACCESSORIES]. Style: [ART STYLE - realistic, anime, painterly, etc.]. Include: 1) Full body or portrait view as specified, 2) Detailed costume design, 3) Characteristic pose, 4) Appropriate background elements, 5) Consistent lighting. Color palette: [COLORS]. Reference artists: [ARTIST NAMES]. Additional details: [SCARS, TATTOOS, UNIQUE FEATURES].

prompts.title: Code Review Assistant
prompts.description: Comprehensive code review with security, performance, and best practices analysis.
prompts.prompt_text:
Act as a senior software engineer conducting a thorough code review. Analyze the following [PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE] code for:

1. **Security Vulnerabilities**: SQL injection, XSS, authentication flaws, data exposure
2. **Performance Issues**: O(n) complexity problems, memory leaks, unnecessary computations
3. **Code Quality**: SOLID principles, DRY violations, code smells
4. **Best Practices**: Naming conventions, documentation, error handling
5. **Testing**: Testability, edge cases, missing test scenarios

Code to review:
```[PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE]
[CODE_BLOCK]
```

Context: [PROJECT_CONTEXT]
Framework: [FRAMEWORK_NAME]

Provide:
- Critical issues (must fix before merge)
- Warnings (should fix soon)
- Suggestions (nice to have)

prompts.title: Lead Capture to CRM Workflow
prompts.description: Automate lead capture from web forms to CRM with enrichment.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow that automates lead capture and CRM entry.

Trigger: [FORM_SOURCE] (Typeform/Webflow/Custom form webhook)
Destination CRM: [CRM_NAME]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Webhook Trigger**: Receive form submission data
2. **Data Validation**: Check required fields (email, name)
3. **Email Verification**: Validate email format and deliverability
4. **Lead Enrichment**: Use [ENRICHMENT_SERVICE] to get company data
5. **Duplicate Check**: Query CRM for existing contact
6. **CRM Entry**: Create or update contact in [CRM_NAME]
7. **Lead Scoring**: Calculate initial score based on [SCORING_CRITERIA]
8. **Assignment**: Route to sales rep based on [ROUTING_RULES]
9. **Notification**: Send Slack message to assigned rep
10. **Welcome Email**: Trigger email sequence in [EMAIL_PLATFORM]

Include:
- Error handling for each step
- Retry logic for API failures
- Logging for debugging
- Data mapping for CRM fields
prompts.use_case: Converting website visitors to qualified CRM leads automatically
prompts.example_output: Workflow nodes: Webhook -> IF (validation) -> HTTP Request (Clearbit) -> IF (duplicate) -> CRM Create -> Calculate Score -> Slack Message -> Email Send

prompts.title: Invoice Processing Automation
prompts.description: Automate invoice processing from email to accounting software.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for automated invoice processing.

Email Source: [EMAIL_PROVIDER]
Accounting Software: [ACCOUNTING_SOFTWARE]
Approval System: [APPROVAL_METHOD]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Email Trigger**: Monitor inbox for invoices (subject/sender filters)
2. **Attachment Extract**: Download PDF/image attachments
3. **OCR Processing**: Extract invoice data using [OCR_SERVICE]
4. **Data Parsing**: Parse vendor, amount, date, line items
5. **Vendor Matching**: Match to existing vendor in [ACCOUNTING_SOFTWARE]
6. **Duplicate Detection**: Check for duplicate invoice numbers
7. **Approval Routing**:
   - Under $[THRESHOLD]: Auto-approve
   - Over $[THRESHOLD]: Route to [APPROVER]
8. **Approval Wait**: Wait for approval (with timeout)
9. **Create Entry**: Create bill/invoice in accounting system
10. **Filing**: Move email to processed folder, store PDF in [STORAGE]
11. **Notification**: Confirm processing via Slack/email

Error Handling:
- OCR confidence threshold
- Manual review queue for low confidence
- Approval reminder escalation
prompts.use_case: Eliminating manual invoice data entry and approval tracking
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Email Trigger -> Extract Attachments -> HTTP (OCR API) -> Code (parse) -> QuickBooks Search -> IF (duplicate) -> IF (amount) -> Wait (approval) -> QuickBooks Create

prompts.title: Social Media Content Scheduler
prompts.description: Schedule and post content across multiple social platforms.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for multi-platform social media scheduling.

Content Source: [CONTENT_SOURCE] (Airtable/Notion/Google Sheets)
Platforms: [PLATFORM_LIST]
Scheduling: [SCHEDULING_PREFERENCES]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Schedule Trigger**: Run at [FREQUENCY] to check pending posts
2. **Fetch Content**: Get approved content from [CONTENT_SOURCE]
3. **Platform Adaptation**:
   - Twitter: Truncate to 280 chars, format hashtags
   - LinkedIn: Professional tone, longer format
   - Instagram: Prepare image, caption, hashtags
   - Facebook: Full content with link preview
4. **Image Processing**: Resize images per platform specs
5. **Scheduling Logic**: Determine optimal post time per platform
6. **Post to Platforms**: Sequential or parallel posting
7. **Update Source**: Mark as posted with URLs
8. **Analytics Tracking**: Log post IDs for later analytics
9. **Error Notification**: Alert on failed posts

Include:
- Rate limiting per platform API
- Content queue management
- A/B testing support
- Hashtag suggestions using AI
prompts.use_case: Managing social presence across platforms from one source
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Schedule -> Airtable Get -> Split by Platform -> Resize Images -> Twitter Post + LinkedIn Post + Instagram Post -> Airtable Update -> Slack Notify

prompts.title: Customer Onboarding Sequence
prompts.description: Automate new customer onboarding with personalized touchpoints.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for automated customer onboarding.

Trigger: [TRIGGER_EVENT] (New subscription, CRM status change)
Email Platform: [EMAIL_PLATFORM]
Product: [PRODUCT_TYPE]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: New customer created in [SOURCE_SYSTEM]
2. **Customer Data Fetch**: Get full profile and subscription details
3. **Segment Assignment**: Categorize by [SEGMENTATION_CRITERIA]
4. **Welcome Email**: Send personalized welcome with [PERSONALIZATION]
5. **Account Setup Tasks**:
   - Create user in product
   - Provision resources
   - Set default preferences
6. **Assign CSM**: Route to customer success manager
7. **Day 1**: Product tour email with video
8. **Day 3**: Feature highlight based on use case
9. **Day 7**: Check-in and offer help
10. **Activity Check**: Monitor product usage
11. **Branch Logic**:
    - Active: Continue onboarding
    - Inactive: Trigger re-engagement
12. **Day 14**: Success milestone email
13. **Complete**: Mark onboarding complete, handoff to support

Include:
- Wait nodes for timing
- Usage-based branching
- CSM notification for at-risk
prompts.use_case: Ensuring consistent, personalized onboarding at scale
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Webhook -> Segment -> Welcome Email -> Wait 1d -> Tutorial Email -> Wait 3d -> IF (active) -> Feature Email / Re-engage -> Wait 7d -> Complete

prompts.title: Support Ticket Routing
prompts.description: Intelligently route support tickets based on content and priority.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for intelligent support ticket routing.

Ticket Source: [TICKETING_SYSTEM]
Team Structure: [TEAM_STRUCTURE]
SLA Requirements: [SLA_TIERS]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Ticket Trigger**: New ticket created webhook
2. **Content Analysis**: Use AI to categorize ticket
   - Topic: [TOPIC_CATEGORIES]
   - Sentiment: Positive/Negative/Urgent
   - Complexity: Simple/Complex
3. **Customer Lookup**: Get customer tier and history
4. **Priority Calculation**:
   - Customer tier weight
   - Sentiment weight
   - Keywords (urgent, broken, etc.)
5. **Team Assignment**:
   - Technical -> Engineering support
   - Billing -> Finance team
   - General -> Tier 1 support
6. **Agent Assignment**: Round-robin within team
7. **SLA Timer**: Set response deadline based on priority
8. **Enrichment**: Add customer context to ticket
9. **Notification**: Alert assigned agent via [CHANNEL]
10. **Escalation Setup**: Schedule escalation if no response

Include:
- VIP customer fast-track
- Out-of-hours handling
- Skill-based routing
prompts.use_case: Getting tickets to the right agent faster
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Zendesk Trigger -> OpenAI Classify -> HTTP (customer lookup) -> Calculate Priority -> Switch (category) -> Assign Agent -> Update Ticket -> Slack Alert

prompts.title: E-commerce Order Fulfillment
prompts.description: Automate order processing from purchase to delivery notification.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for e-commerce order fulfillment.

E-commerce Platform: [ECOMMERCE_PLATFORM]
Fulfillment: [FULFILLMENT_METHOD]
Shipping Carriers: [CARRIER_LIST]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Order Trigger**: New order webhook from [PLATFORM]
2. **Order Validation**: Verify payment, check for fraud signals
3. **Inventory Check**: Verify stock availability
4. **Branch - In Stock**:
   - Yes: Continue to fulfillment
   - No: Backorder process, notify customer
5. **Warehouse Notification**: Send pick list to warehouse system
6. **Wait for Shipment**: Poll or webhook for shipping confirmation
7. **Tracking Update**: Get tracking number from carrier
8. **Customer Notification**: Send shipping confirmation email
9. **Tracking Page**: Create/update tracking page
10. **Delivery Monitoring**: Check carrier API for delivery
11. **Delivered Actions**:
    - Update order status
    - Request review (after [DELAY])
    - Trigger loyalty points
12. **Exception Handling**: Handle returns, lost packages

Include:
- Multi-carrier support
- International shipping rules
- Inventory sync back to platform
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Shopify Order -> Fraud Check -> Inventory Query -> ShipStation Create -> Wait -> Get Tracking -> Klaviyo Email -> Poll Delivery -> Update + Review Request

prompts.title: Content Approval Workflow
prompts.description: Multi-stage content approval with notifications and versioning.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for content approval process.

Content Source: [CMS_PLATFORM]
Approval Stages: [APPROVAL_STAGES]
Notification: [NOTIFICATION_METHOD]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: Content submitted for review
2. **AI Review**: Check for [AI_CHECKS]
   - Grammar/spelling
   - Brand voice compliance
   - Sensitive content
3. **Stage 1 - Editor Review**:
   - Notify editor
   - Wait for approval/rejection
   - Handle feedback loop
4. **Stage 2 - Legal Review** (if required):
   - Check content type rules
   - Route to legal if needed
   - Wait with escalation
5. **Stage 3 - Final Approval**:
   - Notify approver
   - Collect approval
6. **Approved Actions**:
   - Update content status
   - Schedule publication
   - Notify author
7. **Rejected Actions**:
   - Return with comments
   - Notify author
   - Track revision count
8. **Publishing**: Trigger publish at scheduled time

Include:
- Version tracking
- Comment threading
- Deadline reminders
- Audit trail
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Notion Update -> AI Grammar Check -> Slack (editor) -> Wait Response -> IF (approved) -> Slack (legal) -> Wait -> Notion Update -> Schedule Publish

prompts.title: Employee Onboarding Automation
prompts.description: Automate new employee onboarding tasks across systems.

Create an n8n workflow for employee onboarding automation.

HRIS: [HRIS_SYSTEM]
IT Systems: [IT_SYSTEMS]
Communication: [COMM_PLATFORM]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: New employee added to [HRIS_SYSTEM]
2. **Data Extract**: Get employee details (name, dept, start date, role)
3. **Account Creation**:
   - Email account in [EMAIL_PROVIDER]
   - Slack/Teams invite
   - Tool-specific accounts based on role
4. **Access Provisioning**:
   - Add to department groups
   - Assign software licenses
   - VPN/Security access
5. **Equipment Request**: Create IT ticket for laptop/hardware
6. **Calendar Setup**:

   - Schedule orientation meetings
   - Add to team meetings
7. **Buddy Assignment**: Assign and notify onboarding buddy
8. **Welcome Package**:
   - Send welcome email with links
   - Share onboarding docs
   - Provide checklist
9. **Manager Notification**: Alert manager with prep tasks

Include:
- Department-specific variations

prompts.title: Appointment Reminder System
prompts.description: Send multi-channel appointment reminders with confirmation.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for appointment reminders.

Calendar Source: [CALENDAR_SYSTEM]
Reminder Channels: [CHANNELS] (Email, SMS, WhatsApp)
Business Type: [BUSINESS_TYPE]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Schedule Trigger**: Run every hour to check upcoming appointments
2. **Fetch Appointments**: Get appointments in reminder window
3. **Filter**: Only unreminded appointments
4. **Customer Lookup**: Get contact preferences
5. **24-Hour Reminder**:
   - Send via preferred channel
   - Include reschedule link
   - Ask for confirmation
6. **2-Hour Reminder**:
   - Quick reminder
   - Location/meeting link
   - Contact info
7. **Confirmation Handling**:
   - Webhook for confirmations
   - Update appointment status
   - Thank customer
8. **No-Show Handling**:
   - Mark after [GRACE_PERIOD]
   - Follow-up message
   - Reschedule offer
9. **Reporting**: Log reminder success rates

Include:
- Time zone handling
- Business hours respect for SMS
- Cancellation processing
- Waitlist notification if cancelled
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Cron -> Calendly Get -> Filter -> Loop -> IF (24h) -> Twilio SMS + Email -> Wait -> IF (2h) -> SMS -> Webhook (confirmation) -> Update

prompts.title: Data Sync Between Systems
prompts.description: Bidirectional data synchronization between business systems.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for bidirectional data sync.

System A: [SYSTEM_A]
System B: [SYSTEM_B]
Data Type: [DATA_TYPE]
Sync Frequency: [FREQUENCY]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger Options**:
   - Schedule-based sync
   - Webhook on changes
   - Manual trigger
2. **Fetch from System A**: Get modified records since last sync
3. **Fetch from System B**: Get modified records since last sync
4. **Conflict Detection**:
   - Compare timestamps
   - Identify same-record changes
5. **Conflict Resolution**:
   - [RESOLUTION_STRATEGY]: Last write wins / System A wins / Manual
   - Log conflicts for review
6. **Transform A -> B**: Map fields for System B format
7. **Transform B -> A**: Map fields for System A format
8. **Upsert to System A**: Update or create records
9. **Upsert to System B**: Update or create records
10. **Update Sync Log**: Record sync timestamp, counts
11. **Error Handling**: Queue failed records for retry

Include:
- Field mapping configuration
- Data validation
- Sync status dashboard data
- Rollback capability
prompts.use_case: Keeping data consistent across multiple systems
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Cron -> [Salesforce Get + HubSpot Get] -> Merge -> Detect Conflicts -> Resolve -> Split -> [Salesforce Update + HubSpot Update] -> Log

prompts.title: Report Generation and Distribution
prompts.description: Automate report generation and email distribution.

Data Sources: [DATA_SOURCES]
Report Type: [REPORT_TYPE]
Distribution: [DISTRIBUTION_LIST]

prompts.title: Expense Report Automation

prompts.title: Customer Feedback Collection

prompts.title: Competitor Monitoring Workflow

prompts.title: Contract Renewal Automation

   - 1 hour before: Final reminder

   - Recording link

- Time zone handling
- SMS reminders option
- Engagement scoring
- Replay tracking

prompts.title: Slack Bot Command Handler
prompts.description: Build Slack bot commands for common team operations.
prompts.prompt_text:

Commands: [COMMAND_LIST]
Integrations: [INTEGRATED_SYSTEMS]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Slash Command Trigger**: Receive Slack slash command
2. **Command Parser**: Extract command and arguments
3. **User Validation**: Check permissions for command
4. **Command Router** (Switch node):
   - /standup: Collect standup updates
   - /ticket [desc]: Create support ticket
   - /deploy [env]: Trigger deployment
   - /metrics: Fetch and display metrics
   - /pto [dates]: Request time off
5. **Execute Command**: Perform action
6. **Response Formatting**: Create Slack blocks
7. **Send Response**: Reply in channel or ephemeral
8. **Logging**: Track command usage

Command Implementations:
- /standup: Interactive modal, store responses, daily summary
- /ticket: Create in [TICKETING], return ticket link
- /deploy: Trigger CI/CD, stream status updates
- /metrics: Query [ANALYTICS], format charts
- /pto: Create request, notify manager

Include:
- Interactive components (buttons, selects)
- Error messages
- Help command
- Rate limiting
prompts.use_case: Enabling team actions directly from Slack
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Slack Slash -> Parse -> Switch (command) -> [Jira Create | GitHub Deploy | Mixpanel Query] -> Format Blocks -> Slack Response

prompts.title: Failed Payment Recovery

prompts.prompt_text:

Billing System: [BILLING_SYSTEM]
Communication: [COMM_CHANNELS]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: Payment failed webhook
2. **Customer Lookup**: Get customer details and history
3. **Failure Analysis**:
   - Reason code interpretation
   - Card expiry check
   - Previous failure history
4. **Immediate Actions**:
   - Internal alert
   - Flag account
5. **Day 0**: Friendly notification
   - Payment failed email
   - Update payment link
6. **Day 3**: Follow-up
   - Retry payment
   - Second email if still failing
7. **Day 7**: Urgency increase
   - Service impact warning
   - Alternative payment methods
8. **Day 14**: Final notice
   - Account suspension warning
   - Last chance email
9. **Day 21**: Account action
   - Suspend/downgrade
   - Final notification
10. **Recovery Success**: Thank you, re-enable

Include:
- SMS option
- Smart retry timing
- Win-back offers
- Churn prevention triggers
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Stripe Failed -> Customer Lookup -> Day 0 Email -> Wait 3d -> Retry -> IF (success) -> Thank | Day 3 Email -> Wait 4d -> Day 7 Email -> Wait 7d -> Suspend

prompts.title: API Health Monitoring
prompts.description: Monitor API endpoints and alert on failures or slow responses.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for API health monitoring.

APIs to Monitor: [API_LIST]
Alert Channels: [ALERT_CHANNELS]
Check Frequency: [FREQUENCY]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Schedule Trigger**: Run every [FREQUENCY]
2. **Health Checks** (parallel):
   - Endpoint 1: GET [URL]
   - Endpoint 2: GET [URL]
   - Endpoint 3: POST [URL] with test payload
3. **Response Validation**:
   - Status code check (expect 200)
   - Response time measurement
   - Response body validation
4. **Threshold Checks**:
   - Response time > [THRESHOLD]ms: Warning
   - Status != 200: Error
   - Timeout: Critical
5. **Alert Logic**:
   - First failure: Warning
   - Consecutive failures: Critical
   - Recovery: Resolution notice
6. **Alert Routing**:
   - Slack for warnings
   - PagerDuty for critical
   - Email for all
7. **Metrics Storage**: Log to [METRICS_DB]
8. **Status Page Update**: Update public status page

Include:
- Multi-region checks
- SSL certificate monitoring
- Response content checks
- Uptime calculation
prompts.use_case: Catching API issues before customers do
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Cron 1min -> [HTTP API1 + HTTP API2 + HTTP API3] -> Validate Responses -> IF (error) -> Count Consecutive -> IF (>2) -> PagerDuty + Slack -> Log Metrics

prompts.description: Automate database backups with verification and rotation.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for database backup automation.

Databases: [DATABASE_LIST]
Storage: [BACKUP_STORAGE]
Retention: [RETENTION_POLICY]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Schedule**: Run at [BACKUP_TIME] daily
2. **Pre-Backup Check**: Verify database accessible
3. **Backup Execution**:
   - Execute backup command (pg_dump, mysqldump)
   - Compress output
   - Calculate checksum
4. **Upload to Storage**:
   - S3/GCS/Azure Blob
   - Organized by date
5. **Verification**:
   - Verify file exists
   - Check file size reasonable
   - Optional: test restore
6. **Rotation**:
   - Keep daily for [DAYS]
   - Keep weekly for [WEEKS]
   - Keep monthly for [MONTHS]
   - Delete old backups
7. **Success Notification**: Confirm backup complete
8. **Failure Handling**:
   - Immediate alert
   - Retry logic
   - Escalation
9. **Logging**: Backup history and metrics

Include:
- Encryption at rest
- Cross-region replication
- Backup integrity testing
- Restore documentation
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Cron 2am -> SSH pg_dump -> Compress -> S3 Upload -> Verify Size -> Delete Old -> Slack Success / PagerDuty Fail

prompts.description: Process survey responses with analysis and routing.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for survey response processing.

Survey Platform: [SURVEY_PLATFORM]
Data Storage: [STORAGE_DESTINATION]
Actions: [RESPONSE_ACTIONS]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: Survey response submitted
2. **Data Extraction**: Parse response fields
3. **Analysis**:
   - Calculate scores
   - Sentiment analysis on open-ends
   - Categorize responses
4. **Respondent Lookup**: Match to customer record
5. **Data Storage**:
   - Store in [DATABASE]
   - Update customer profile
   - Aggregate metrics
6. **Response Routing**:
   - Negative: Alert support
   - Request contact: Create task
   - Positive: Thank you + review ask
7. **Segment Update**: Update based on responses
8. **Reporting**:
   - Real-time dashboard update
   - Summary to stakeholders
9. **Follow-up**: Trigger appropriate sequence

Include:
- Anonymous response handling
- Partial response processing
- Duplicate prevention
- Response rate tracking
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Typeform -> Parse -> OpenAI Sentiment -> Customer Match -> [Airtable + HubSpot Update] -> Switch (score) -> [Alert | Task | Thank Email]

prompts.title: Content Repurposing Pipeline
prompts.description: Automatically repurpose content across formats and channels.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for content repurposing.

Source Content: [CONTENT_SOURCE]
Output Formats: [FORMAT_LIST]
Distribution: [CHANNEL_LIST]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: New content published (blog, video, podcast)
2. **Content Fetch**: Get full content and metadata
3. **AI Repurposing**:
   - Generate social snippets
   - Create thread version
   - Extract key quotes
   - Generate newsletter section
4. **Visual Creation**:
   - Quote graphics
   - Carousel slides
   - Video clips (if applicable)
5. **Format Specific**:
   - Blog -> Medium article
   - Podcast -> Audiogram
   - Video -> Short clips
6. **Schedule Distribution**:
   - Immediate: Announcement
   - Day 2-7: Snippets
   - Week 2+: Evergreen rotation
7. **Cross-Platform Posting**: Adapted for each
8. **Performance Tracking**: Engagement by format

Include:
- Brand voice consistency
- Hashtag research
- Best time scheduling
- A/B testing variations
prompts.use_case: Maximizing content ROI with minimal effort
prompts.example_output: Workflow: RSS New Post -> OpenAI (snippets, quotes) -> Canva Generate -> Schedule: [Day 0 Announcement + Day 2 Thread + Day 4 Quote] -> Track

prompts.title: Team Standup Collector
prompts.description: Collect async standups and summarize for the team.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for async standup collection.

Team Communication: [COMM_PLATFORM]
Project Tracking: [PROJECT_TOOL]
Schedule: [STANDUP_SCHEDULE]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Schedule Trigger**: [TIME] on workdays
2. **Team Lookup**: Get active team members
3. **Send Prompts**: DM standup questions
   - What did you complete yesterday?
   - What are you working on today?
   - Any blockers?
4. **Collect Responses**: Wait for replies (timeout: 2 hours)
5. **Response Processing**:
   - Parse updates
   - Identify blockers
   - Link to tickets if mentioned
6. **AI Summary**: Generate team summary
7. **Post Summary**:
   - Team channel summary
   - Blockers highlighted
   - Missing standups noted
8. **Blocker Alerts**: DM managers for blockers
9. **Archive**: Store standups for reference
10. **Reporting**: Weekly productivity trends

Include:
- Time zone handling
- Skip on holidays
- Reminder for missing
- Vacation awareness
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Cron 9am -> Slack Get Team -> Slack DM Each -> Wait 2h -> Collect Replies -> OpenAI Summarize -> Slack Post Channel -> Alert Blockers

prompts.title: Quote to Order Pipeline
prompts.description: Automate the quote creation to order fulfillment process.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for quote-to-order automation.

CRM: [CRM_NAME]
CPQ/Quote Tool: [CPQ_TOOL]
ERP/Order System: [ORDER_SYSTEM]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Quote Request Trigger**: New quote requested
2. **Customer Data**: Fetch customer info and pricing tier
3. **Product Configuration**:
   - Apply customer-specific pricing
   - Calculate discounts
   - Check inventory/availability
4. **Generate Quote**:
   - Create quote document
   - Apply terms and conditions
   - Generate PDF
5. **Approval Routing** (if needed):
   - Check discount thresholds
   - Route for approval
   - Wait for approval
6. **Send to Customer**:
   - Email with quote
   - Signature request
7. **Quote Accepted**:
   - Create order in ERP
   - Update CRM opportunity
   - Trigger fulfillment
8. **Quote Expired**: Follow-up sequence
9. **Reporting**: Quote conversion metrics

Include:
- Version control for revisions
- Multi-currency support
- Bundle pricing
- Contract term options
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Salesforce Quote Request -> Build Quote -> IF (discount high) -> Approval -> DocuSign Send -> Wait -> Order Create in NetSuite -> Fulfill

prompts.title: Security Alert Response
prompts.description: Automate security alert triage and initial response.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for security alert handling.

Security Tools: [SECURITY_TOOLS]
Ticketing: [TICKETING_SYSTEM]
Communication: [ALERT_CHANNELS]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Alert Trigger**: Security alert webhook (SIEM, WAF, etc.)
2. **Alert Parsing**:
   - Extract severity
   - Identify source
   - Get affected systems
3. **Enrichment**:
   - IP reputation lookup
   - User context
   - Historical patterns
4. **Severity Assessment**:
   - Critical: Immediate action
   - High: Urgent review
   - Medium: Queue for review
   - Low: Log and monitor
5. **Critical Response**:
   - Page security team
   - Auto-block IP (if policy allows)
   - Create incident
   - Start timeline
6. **High Response**:
   - Create urgent ticket
   - Slack security channel
   - Gather evidence
7. **Documentation**:
   - Create incident record
   - Attach evidence
   - Start runbook
8. **Reporting**: Security metrics dashboard

Include:
- False positive handling
- Escalation paths
- Compliance logging
- Post-incident workflow
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Datadog Alert -> Parse -> VirusTotal IP Check -> Switch (severity) -> [PagerDuty + Block IP | Jira Urgent | Log Only] -> Document

prompts.title: Podcast Publishing Workflow
prompts.description: Automate podcast episode publishing and promotion.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for podcast publishing automation.

Hosting Platform: [PODCAST_HOST]
Distribution: [DISTRIBUTION_CHANNELS]
Promotion: [PROMOTION_CHANNELS]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: New episode uploaded
2. **Episode Processing**:
   - Generate transcript (AI)
   - Create show notes
   - Extract quotes/highlights
3. **Distribution**:
   - Verify syndication to directories
   - Update website/blog
   - YouTube upload (if video)
4. **Promotional Assets**:
   - Audiogram clips
   - Quote graphics
   - Episode trailer
5. **Social Promotion**:
   - Announcement posts
   - Thread with key points
   - Clips throughout week
6. **Newsletter**:
   - Add to next newsletter
   - Or send dedicated email
7. **Guest Notification**: Alert guest with assets
8. **Analytics**: Track downloads and engagement

Include:
- Scheduling for optimal times
- SEO optimization
- Sponsor mentions
- Cross-promotion requests
prompts.example_output: Workflow: Transistor New Episode -> AssemblyAI Transcript -> OpenAI Show Notes -> WordPress Post -> [Twitter + LinkedIn + YouTube] -> Mailchimp Queue

prompts.title: Partnership Onboarding Workflow
prompts.description: Automate new partner onboarding and enablement.
prompts.prompt_text:
Create an n8n workflow for partner onboarding automation.

Partner Portal: [PARTNER_PORTAL]
CRM: [CRM_NAME]
Enablement: [ENABLEMENT_PLATFORM]

Workflow Steps:
1. **Trigger**: Partner agreement signed
2. **Partner Setup**:
   - Create partner account
   - Generate portal credentials
   - Assign partner manager
3. **Access Provisioning**:
   - Partner portal access
   - Resource library
   - Deal registration system
4. **Welcome Sequence**:
   - Welcome email with credentials
   - Introduction to partner manager
   - Key resources overview
5. **Enablement**:
   - Assign certification paths
   - Schedule training sessions
   - Provide sales materials
6. **First 30 Days**:
   - Week 1: Platform training
   - Week 2: Sales training
   - Week 3: Joint planning call
   - Week 4: First deal support
7. **Milestone Tracking**: Monitor activation
8. **Reporting**: Partner onboarding metrics

Include:
- Tier-specific onboarding
- Document collection
- Compliance verification
- Success metrics tracking
prompts.example_output: Workflow: DocuSign Complete -> Create Partner Record -> Portal Provision -> Mailchimp Welcome Sequence -> LMS Enroll -> Schedule Training -> 30-Day Checks
